name: Restaurant Story: Founders
description:
Design🏔, prep🥩, cook🍳, and earn💰 in this free restaurant game of your very own! Feel free to design the best restaurant to show off to your friends and family. Design the home for your Chef’s masterpiece meals. From a world class star restaurant to a hometown diner. We provide everything for you!

Design for life 🌞, design for love ❤️, design for the soul ☯️. This free casual restaurant designing and cooking game has it all! We have over thousands of decorations and themes that you can choose to design your restaurant or cafe or diner.

Designing is life, designing is love, designing is good for the soul. Chefs that design their home and their restauarant are the best at what they do. The restaurant is a blank canvas that they make their home and design it to the full extent of their capabilities. Homes are also places where the best cooking is done. Hence, Chef’s designing restaurants and cooking in homes is exactly what this free casual restaurant game aims to provide.

▶️As the Master Chef you will design and choose stunning decorations and cook new Chef dishes from around the cooking world. This free restaurant game provides new recipes for your cooking pleasure every week! Dash to download this #1 FREE Android restaurant cooking game now! Enjoy the fever of being the owner Chef of a restaurant so successful your Mama will think your cooking is better than hers🙏!

👩‍🍳Cooking Chef level food in a dash that is designed for Mama to enjoy is what we want your free restaurant or diner or cafe of your dreams to be about! Chef! Don't forget to make sure your customers are happy and well-fed by choosing stunning decorations and tasty new dishes! New cooking recipes will be released EVERY WEEK so the game continually gets even better❗️

In addition to cooking as a Chef you can design, decorate, and deck out the restaurant you always wanted, with thousands of different ways to design your free restaurant. From hip corner cafe to pirate ships!

Why choose any other free casual cooking restaurant game that also allows you to design and decorate to your delight?!

🍕 Cooking as a Chef in this free restaurant game happens on the stovetop or in the oven.
-Design and decorate something your Mama will be proud of, be it a coffee cafe, a 50s diner, an italian restaurant, or whatever you choose that provides stunning variety and creativity. Design the walls, design the tiles, design the chairs, design the tables, design the center pieces of your free restaurant!
🥓Enjoy cooking top-class menus to suit your tastes.
Get your diner or restaurant or cafe ready in a dash and earn extra-special tips from friends and get compliments as the Chef!
- Simple and easy-to-use tap interface that only a Chef can use!
🌇Hundreds of Chef dish selections from Creme Brulee to Fish and Chips.
- FREE cooking restaurant game updates with new dishes, decorations, themes and more EVERY WEEK!
- It's the #1 FREE restaurant design and cooking game!

PLEASE NOTE:
-This is an online game only.
-Design minded Chef’s wanted!

Please note that Restaurant Story is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use PIN for purchase. Then, set up the four-digit PIN on the option below. In addition, Restaurant Story may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.
